Subject: Re: At our base
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Astroblast emerges from the base and turns around and transforms into a
train. Wildrider and Dead-End step out, and enter the train. "Alllright,
lets burn some ruber" screams Wildrider. As they enter the door shuts, and
the Astroblast's motor can be heard reving up. He starts to girate forward,
his wheels spinning rapidly, then when he gains enough speed he transforms
into the shuttle and lifts off the ground, heading towards the grand
canyon.
